titles.title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to increase the salary of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/1/2007--Introduced. Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to increase the salary of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia to 150% of the rate of basic pay for level I of the Executive Schedule.
